summary: Dragon Bridge - Tree Lodge, small player home up in the trees with a fantastic view over Dragon Bridge
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#FBB117]PLEASE READ - important info[/color][/b]

This player home was made for my character (Bosmer) with my tastes, wishes and needs in mind. It will not suit those who wish to marry, adopt or have companions as it was built with my loner Wood Elf in mind.

This is my first upload so be gentle with me (ha-ha)
I just wanted to share this with anyone who likes to play as I do.

[b][color=#FBB117]You will need all the DLC's[/color][/b]

It is very easy to find just stand at the Dragon Bridge and look right, follow the path up.

There are two outside crafting areas so it will RAIN out there - yes it is supposed to! There are two braziers for those who need to keep warm while crafting (Frostfall friendly)

[b][color=#FBB117]IT IS NOT Navmeshed[/color][/b] - (area below the house cleared of Navmesh only) as I said I have no need as I play a single char with no followers etc. However if you wish to Navmesh it and re upload please go ahead

[b][color=#FBB117]WHAT IT DOES HAVE[/color][/b]
Fantastic high views over Dragon Bridge and surrounding area
Alchemy, Enchanting and full smith areas
Lots of storage some unique using meshes from people listed below in the credits
Kitchen with oven and cook pot, also unique storage


[b][color=#FBB117]WHAT IT DOESNâ€™T HAVE[/color][/b]
Navmesh
Spouse, Adoption or companion friendly
Fast travel marker
Displays everywhere (has unique containers instead)


[youtube]SnMsmeU116g[/youtube]

A HUGE thank you to izon87604 for this beautiful video

[b][color=#FBB117]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER HOUSE MODS[/color][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54937/?]Orc Longhouse[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55212/?]Riverwatch (Dawnguard Themed) - Riverwood[/url]


[b][color=#FBB117]A HUGE THANK YOU TO THE FOLLOWING[/color][/b] whom I use in most of my house mods.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14133/?]FoodContainer Resource[/url]

author: Fade Willow
